The Vanishing Melody: A Mysterious Journey Through Time - In this immersive experience, visitors are transported through a time portal to a world where music has disappeared. They must navigate through a surreal landscape filled with eerie silences and uncover the secrets behind the vanishing melody. Along the way, they encounter strange creatures and witness historical events that led to the disappearance of music. Through interactive exhibits and multimedia displays, visitors are transported back in time to uncover the truth behind the day the music disappeared.

The Last Song: A Race Against Time - In this thrilling experience, visitors are put in the shoes of detectives tasked with solving the mystery of the disappeared music. They must race against time to find the last remaining songs before they disappear forever. As they journey through a series of challenges and puzzles, they uncover clues and piece together the events that led to the disappearance of music. The experience culminates in a final showdown where visitors must use their knowledge and skills to save the last song and restore music to the world.

The Symphony of Silence - In this haunting experience, visitors are invited to a world where music has been replaced by silence. They must navigate through a series of eerie environments, each one representing a different aspect of the disappeared music. Along the way, they encounter ghostly apparitions of musicians and composers, who guide them through the symphony of silence. As they progress, visitors uncover the secrets behind the disappearance of music and the impact it has had on society. The experience culminates in a final performance where visitors must use their own voices to bring music back to life.

The Music Detective Agency - In this interactive experience, visitors are recruited as detectives to solve the mystery of the disappeared music. They must use their skills and knowledge to investigate clues and piece together the events that led to the disappearance of music. Along the way, they encounter a cast of colorful characters, each one with their own motives and secrets. As they progress, visitors uncover the truth behind the disappearance of music and the sinister forces that are behind it. The experience culminates in a final showdown where visitors must use their detective skills to save music from disappearing forever.
